quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Every problem is a gift - without problems we would not grow.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.text: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Rest when you're weary. Refresh and renew yourself, your body, your mind, your spirit.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.text: Every expert was once a beginner. Every pro was once an amateur.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.text: You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou
